welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guifoes, Portugal! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its stunning architecture, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Braga Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
